articles.title: Wendy's announces Uber-like surge pricing model - Good Morning America
articles.description: Wendy’s, the country’s second-largest burger chain, said it will introduce menu prices that will fluctuate depending on the time of day.
articles.content:
Wendys announced it will launch new menu prices that will fluctuate depending on the time of day.
